content:
Hi Guys...,

Just testing HybridAuth and on github... https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/hybridauth/issues/8

laryn mentions about the SDK... but doesn't say which SDK... does anyone know where I get it from? Is it a Facebook one?

Thanks

Facebook integration 路 Issue #8 路 backdrop-contrib/hybridauth
I've tested this and got the basics working. One issue is that the Facebook SDK needs to be added separately. If we are able, I'll bundle it directly. (I'm asking about whether their li...
I think the SDK repo is linked from that issue. We probably need to fund a better place to have it manually uploaded though. Would appreciate testing and feedback!

Laryn said:

I think the SDK repo is linked from that issue. We probably need to fund a better place to have it manually uploaded though. Would appreciate testing and feedback!

Ahhh got it... Thanks

@Laryn Do I need to create the User account "First name" and "Last name" fields? or should the module create those?

Just trying to add the Rules "rules_change_user_info_on_creation" Intergration.

Steve Moorhouse said:

Laryn Do I need to create the User account "First name" and "Last name" fields? or should the module create those?

Just trying to add the Rules "rules_change_user_info_on_creation" Intergration.

Yes you do... :-)

@Laryn

I've created the fields and the Rule saves... but on submitting the Register form I get the error...

Error
Call to undefined method AnonymousUser::save()

Any ideas
I don't have an answer on the top of my head... Please take notes
